attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: nowhere has anyone mentioned the impossibly heavy penalties that will be incurred by people who live in remote rural areas for whom there is no public transport; nor the army of "essential users" who work in rural areas - farmers, medical and social work staff, community carers, voluntary workers, etc.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
